biotools.summary: taveRNA hosts three RNA web services: alteRNA, inteRNA and pRuNA. alteRNA is an alternative to many RNA folding methods. inteRNA predicts the joint secondary structure of two RNA sequences. pRuNA is an database pruning method which given a query RNA returns only a few ncRNAs as potential regulators.

bioschemas.name: taveRNA
